name: gitbook-template
description: A gitbook-template for publishing a book to the GA-Library.

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && rm -rf _book && gitbook build
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs' && git push git@github.com:WDI-Library/starter-template gh-pages --force

author: Alex Chin
